Legal_Issue: Whether the leadership selection process was conducted in accordance with the Mitchikanibikok Anishinabe Onakinakewin and whether it was fair
Evidence_Assessment: Lack of evidence regarding exercise of office by claimed leaders
Burden_of_Proof: Applicant bore burden to demonstrate invalidity
Credibility_Factor: Bias due to Elders Council's vested interest
Legal_Rule: Leadership selection must comply with customary law and procedural fairness
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness or correctness, as applicable under judicial review
Procedural_Issue: Lack of inclusivity, procedural irregularities, bias in selection process
Grounds_for_Claim: Non-compliance with customary governance law, unfairness, bias
Outcome_on_Merits: Process invalidated; no declaration of legitimate leadership
Judicial_Review_Outcome: Partial success: process invalidated, no quo warranto relief granted
Review_Standard: Judicial review under Federal Courts Act
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Process found to be unfair and biased
Key_Evidence_Considered: Nature of Elders Council involvement, exclusion of community members, procedural deviations
Legal_Framework: Customary law (Mitchikanibikok Anishinabe Onakinakewin) and federal judicial review framework
Applicant_Challenge: Challenging validity of June 24, 2009 leadership selection assembly
Court_Result: Invalidation of leadership selection process; denial of quo warranto relief
Legal_Rule_Source: Mitchikanibikok Anishinabe Onakinakewin, Federal Courts Act
Defendant_Response: Not explicitly detailed in case summary
Evidence_Type: Documentary, procedural records, claims of customary law compliance
Outcome: Relief denied due to lack of evidence of office exercise
Remedy_Sought: Declaration of invalidity and removal from office
Authority: Federal Court jurisdiction over federal boards/commissions
Legal_Provision_Cited: Sections 18 and 18.1 of the Federal Courts Act
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Procedural unfairness, bias, non-compliance with customary law
Applicable_Process: Leadership selection under customary governance law
Outcome_of_Review: Process invalidated; no replacement leadership declared
